snippet: The United States has indicted Tomás Yarrington Ruvalcaba, a former governor of a Mexican state and a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party, on racketeering and money laundering charges.
abstract: United States has indicted Tomas Yarrington Ruvalcaba, former governor of Mexico's Tamaulipas State, in a case that has come to illustrate concerns over political corruption in the governing Institutional Revolutionary Party; Ruvalcaba is charged with racketeering and money laundering.
lead_paragraph: The United States has indicted Tomás Yarrington Ruvalcaba, a former governor of a Mexican state and a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party, on racketeering and money laundering charges.

headline.main: Mexico: U.S. Indicts a Former Governor
headline.print_headline: Mexico: U.S. Indicts a Former Governor
